comments:
1. Select an element in a report design.
Export the element to an existing library.

In Navigator, double click the library to open it. The following error dialog appears:
Resource is out of sync with the file system: /First BIRT Project/Test.rptlibrary.
Reason:
An unexpected internal exception occurred. Please see log for detail.

The details of the error are:
An unexpected internal exception occurred.Please see log for detail.
  Plug-in Provider:Eclipse.org
  Plug-in Name:BIRT Designer UI
  Plug-in ID:org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui
  Version:2.0.0
  Error Code:Error.GUIException.invokedByUnexpectedException
  Error Message:Resource is out of sync with the file system: /First BIRT Project/Test.rptlibrary.

In layout, the following message appears:
Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: Cannot open the file.

The details are:

In Navigator, choose the library file and refresh it with F5.
Now the file opens as expected.

2. Open an existing library in the layout.
Select an element in a report design.
Export the element to the library you just opened.

In Navigator, choose the library file and refresh it with F5.
Double click the library to open its view in the layout editor.
A warning message appears, that the file was modified on the file system, and asks if you want to refresh it.
Accept refreshing the file.

The library's layout opens but is not refreshed. The element you just added is not visible in the outline.

Close the library and reopen it.
Now the element is visible in the outline.

That's expected behavior that we don't support automatically refresh for library chagnes.
Please contact with Wenfeng and Wenbin for more details.
Exporting a single element is not supported in 2.0. Closing this bug as obsolete.
